mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vv_student (STU_ID, STU_NAME, STU_MAKE_TIME) VALUES (#{stu_id}, #{stu_name}, NOW())

INSERT INTO vv_student_info (STU_ID, STU_LITTLE_NAME, STU_SEX, STU_BIRTHDAY, STU_KINDERGARTEN, STU_ADDRESS, STU_PHONE, STU_BELONG_TEACHER, STU_BACKINFO, STU_SOURCE) VALUES ( #{stu_id}, #{stu_lt_name}, #{stu_sex}, #{stu_birthday}, #{stu_kindergarten}, #{stu_address}, #{stu_phone}, '1', #{stu_backinfo}, '1')
